name: Mesh
description:
In this "Ant-Smasher-meets-Geometry-Wars" game you use your mouse to destroy neon blocks that fall through the mesh in an attempt to get the highest score. But watch out for the "special" blocks which can end the run or have unforeseen effects on the gameplay! The more you play the harder it gets, but the better you get the higher the scores!

FEATURES

  • Addictive progressive gameplay
  • Multiple block types and patterns
  • Mesmerizing neon graphics
  • Stunning Music by Kubbi
  • Online Scoreboard

CONTROLS

The game is controlled only by the mouse. LMB to destroy the blocks, hold LMB to power up explosion when your energy bar is full.
